title: Takarakuji x Rope
synopsis: A collaboration between Kamiusagi Rope and Takarakuji the nationwide lottery system in Japan in honor of 2013 having the all time highest amount (800 million yen) winnable to date for the lottery system. These episodes were included on season 4's DVD release.
related_anime: ['Kamiusagi Rope: Warau Asa ni wa Fukuraitaru tte Maji ssuka!?', 'Scratch x One Piece Film: Gold']
